task.title: Calculating areas defined by points
task.shortdesc: You can find the area and perimeter of any closed region by specifying a series of points. The program calculates the area and perimeter of the space that is enclosed by an imaginary polygon consisting of straight line segments connecting each point.

context.p: To calculate the area defined by points you specify

step.cmd: Choose Tools > Inquiry > Area from the main menu.
Continue specifying points in sequence to define the perimeter of the area you want to measure.
To complete the selection, press Enter.
The area and perimeter of the region youdefined are displayed.

result.p: Select the points (A, B, C) that form a polygon. The area and perimeter of the region are then calculated.
